messages.subject: seeking military unschoolers
messages.msgSnippet: Hi, I know there are some other military families on this list who unschool.  If you would be willing to fill out a questionnaire to help the folks quoted
messages.messageBody:
Hi,

I know there are some other military families on this list who unschool. If
you would be willing to fill out a questionnaire to help the folks quoted
below, please email me off list at abtleo@... or Valarie directly
at starrmoon@... When I last heard from Valarie, she was receiving
many replies from "schoolinabox" types and was interested in hearing from
more unschoolers. Thanks!

brenda

> Valarie Moon @ starrmoon@... writes:

> Two other military homeschoolers, Sue Patterson and Beth Elliot, and
> I are writing a book, so far named On The Move: A Guide to Military
> Homeschooling. Sue is the military coordinator for the National Home
> Education Network (NHEN) military pages:
> http://www.nhen.org/nhen/pov/military/default.asp?id=202 , and Beth
> is the owner of the military homeschooling email group,
> HomeschoolMilitary: http://groups.yahoo.com/group/HomeschoolMilitary/ .

> We would like the voices, other than ours, of other military
> homeschoolers to be heard.
